name: Squad Buddies
description:
Squad Buddies is an Action/RTS game where you control a squad of Buddies (one Buddie for each player at maximum of 4 for each squad) for color supremacy. You need to recolect "Seeds"(Those boxes) and  "plant" them at the construction platform to craft weapons, buddies and vehicles.

The idea of this game is to recover the arcade feeling from PSX videogames, trying to make it fun with tons of game modes/minigames with a competitive style like. Like  battle royale style, but without the dome.

-CONTROLS-

KEYBOARD

WASD: Movement

Left Mouse Button: Grab boxes/Shoot

Right Mouse Button: Drop boxes /Unmount vehicles

Space Bar: Break boxes / Mount Vehicles

MOUSE

Aim to look at
